title: AWS IoT Fleet Provisioning
description: A Node.js implementation for AWS IoT Fleet Provisioning that enables automatic provisioning of IoT devices with unique certificates and registration without pre-generating certificates.
details:
AWS IoT Fleet Provisioning is a comprehensive Node.js solution that automates the process of provisioning IoT devices at scale. The system uses claim certificates with limited permissions to securely provision new devices with unique certificates and register them as IoT Things in AWS IoT Core. Key features include:

- Automated device provisioning using AWS IoT Fleet Provisioning
- Claim certificate management with minimal permissions
- Batch provisioning support for multiple devices
- Secure MQTT communication over port 8883
- Template-based provisioning configuration
- Real-time provisioning status tracking
- Error handling and retry mechanisms
- Certificate and policy management

Built with Node.js and AWS IoT Device SDK, this solution is perfect for mass device deployment scenarios where manual certificate generation is not feasible.

title: MSM - Machine State Monitoring
description: A comprehensive IoT monitoring system with Node.js backend, MQTT communication, and MongoDB for real-time machine state monitoring, device management, and telemetry data processing.
details:
MSM (Machine State Monitoring) is an advanced IoT monitoring platform designed for industrial machine monitoring and management. The system provides real-time telemetry data collection, device configuration management, and comprehensive monitoring capabilities. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and AWS IoT Core, it offers:

- Real-time telemetry data collection and processing
- Device command and control via MQTT
- Multi-phase power monitoring (voltage, current, power, energy)
- Remote device configuration (NTP, MQTT, SFTP)
- RESTful API for device management
- MongoDB for scalable data storage
- AWS IoT Core integration for secure communication
- Device status monitoring and alerts
- Batch device management capabilities

The platform supports industrial-grade monitoring with features like power quality analysis, energy consumption tracking, and remote device management through secure MQTT communication.

title: Course Reel
description: A powerful MERN stack video editing platform that lets users create, edit, and download custom videos with text, images, and audio.
details:
Course Reel is a comprehensive video editing platform built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) that enables users to create professional-looking videos with ease. Key features include:

- User authentication (login/register)
- Video creation and editing interface
- Text overlay with customizable fonts, colors, and sizes
- Background image customization
- Multi-slide creation with multiple images
- Audio integration for background music or voiceovers
- Video processing using FFmpeg for high-quality output
- Download edited videos in various formats
- Responsive design for all devices

The platform uses React for the frontend, Node.js with Express for the backend, MongoDB for data storage, and FFmpeg for video processing. The intuitive interface makes video editing accessible to users of all skill levels.

title: My Way
description: An industrial-grade transportation management system with real-time tracking, facility management, and ride booking capabilities.
details:
My Way is a comprehensive transportation management system designed for industrial facilities, featuring real-time tracking and management of vehicles, drivers, and passengers. The system includes:

- Multi-role authentication (Facility, Driver, Passenger, Admin)
- Facility management portal for adding/managing drivers and vehicles
- Driver mobile application with real-time location tracking
- Passenger ride booking and tracking system
- Student/guardian tracking for school transportation
- Real-time status updates via WebSockets
- Route management and optimization
- Vehicle capacity tracking
- Document verification system for drivers
- Ride history and reporting

Built with Laravel for the backend API, Vue.js for the admin dashboard, and WebSockets for real-time updates, this system provides a complete solution for managing industrial transportation needs with live tracking and status updates.

title: Maze Therapeutics IR Portal
description: A professional Investor Relations portal for Maze Therapeutics, built with WordPress, custom CSS, and specialized plugins to serve shareholders and financial analysts.
details:
Developed the Investor Relations (IR) portal for Maze Therapeutics, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. The site serves as a comprehensive resource for investors, analysts, and shareholders with the following features:

- Press releases and financial reports (Q2 2025 results, etc.)
- SEC filings management (10-Q, 8-K, 13G/A)
- Investor events calendar (conferences, earnings calls)
- Corporate presentations and overviews
- Analyst coverage information
- Investor FAQ section
- Custom plugins for financial data display
- Responsive design for all devices

Built with WordPress for easy content management, custom CSS for brand alignment, and specialized plugins for financial data presentation and security.

title: Facebook Post Scraper
description: A PHP-based web scraper that extracts posts, content, titles, and account information from Facebook pages and stores them in a database for display.
details:
The Facebook Post Scraper is a powerful tool that automates the process of collecting and displaying Facebook posts. The system includes:
- Web scraping functionality to extract post data from Facebook pages
- Database storage for efficient data management
- Clean, responsive frontend to display scraped posts
- Error handling and logging for reliable operation

Built with core PHP and MySQL, this tool demonstrates skills in web scraping, database management, and backend development. The system can be easily extended to include additional features like scheduling and data analysis.
features: Scrapes Facebook posts including content and metadata

title: Tour Management System
description: As a full stack Laravel developer, I have built a Tour Management System with admin dashboard, agency dashboard, and user dashboard functionality. The system also handles tour bookings and provides a seamless experience for agencies and travelers.
details:
The Tour Management System is a comprehensive web application designed for travel agencies, admins, and end users. As the full stack developer, I implemented:
- Admin Dashboard: Manage agencies, users, tours, and bookings with analytics and notifications.
- Agency Dashboard: Agencies can create and manage tours, view bookings, and interact with customers.
- User Dashboard: Users can browse tours, make bookings, and track their reservations.
- Booking Engine: Secure and robust tour booking with real-time availability.
- Responsive UI: Modern interface with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js for smooth interactivity.

Built with Laravel (backend), Alpine.js (interactivity), Tailwind CSS (UI), MySQL (database), and Swiper (gallery), the system is fast, secure, and user-friendly.
features: Modern UI with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js

title: Rental Product Plugin
description: As a WordPress developer, I have built a plugin which serves product rental functionality. All rental products can be handled through the dashboard menu.
details:
Rental Product Plugin is a custom WordPress plugin developed to provide seamless product rental functionality for e-commerce sites. As the developer, I implemented:
- Dashboard integration for easy rental product management
- Elementor compatibility for flexible design
- Payment gateway integration for smooth transactions
- Responsive design for all devices

The plugin allows site owners to add, edit, and manage rental products directly from the WordPress dashboard, making it easy to offer rental services online.
features: Dashboard menu for rental product management

title: Shopify Product Theme
description: As a full stack developer, I have built a Shopify store with dynamic custom theme customization.
details:
Shopify Product Theme is a custom Shopify store solution featuring dynamic theme customization. As the full stack developer, I implemented:
- Custom Liquid templates for flexible product and collection layouts
- Advanced theme customization options from the Shopify admin
- Integration of JavaScript and CSS for enhanced interactivity and design
- Fully responsive and mobile-friendly design

This project enables store owners to easily update the look and feel of their store without code, while providing a seamless shopping experience for customers.

title: Dixon Pim Project
description: As a backend developer, I handled a massive amount of data related to products and its categories. Implemented Distributors and REST API functionality related to products.
details:
Dixon Pim Project is a large-scale backend system for managing high-volume product and category data. As the backend developer, I implemented:
- Efficient data models for products and categories
- Distributor management and syndication system
- REST API endpoints for product data integration
- Automated product import/export workflows

The solution is built on WordPress and PHP, enabling seamless product management and third-party integrations for distributors and partners.
features: Massive product and category data handling

title: Laravel Vue App
description: As a frontend developer, I have built a Laravel Vue site with responsive design using Alpine.js and Tailwind CSS.
details:
Laravel Vue App is a modern web application built with Laravel as the backend and Vue.js as the frontend. As the frontend developer, I implemented:
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Dynamic UI with Vue.js and Alpine.js
- Swiper.js for interactive sliders
- Seamless integration between Laravel and Vue components

The project delivers a fast, interactive, and mobile-friendly user experience.

title: Woofcrate
description: Created a fully functioning ecommerce website with Shopify and WordPress collaboration.
details:
Woofcrate is a fully functioning ecommerce website built through the collaboration of Shopify and WordPress. The project features:
- Seamless integration between Shopify and WordPress for product and content management
- Custom web flows for user experience optimization
- Payment gateway setup with Stripe integration
- Responsive design and dynamic product listings

This solution allows for flexible store management and a smooth customer journey across platforms.

title: Repair Greek
description: Repait Greek is a modern web application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Tailwind Motion. The project features a fully responsive design, smooth motion effects, and a clean, user-friendly interface, making it ideal for both desktop and mobile users.
details: Repait Greek is a showcase of modern frontend engineering. Built with React for robust component architecture, styled with Tailwind CSS for rapid and consistent UI, and animated using Tailwind Motion for delightful transitions and interactivity. The design is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless experience on both desktop and mobile devices. This project demonstrates best practices in UI/UX, accessibility, and performance, making it a model for contemporary web apps.

title: 90seats
description: 90seats is a robust full-stack web application for seat booking and management. Built using the MERN stack, it features a modern React frontend, fast Node.js/Express backend, and MongoDB for scalable data storage. The UI is crafted with TailwindCSS for a responsive, mobile-friendly experience.
details: 90seats is a comprehensive seat booking and management platform built on the MERN stack. The frontend leverages React and TailwindCSS for a modern, responsive, and highly interactive user experience. The backend, powered by Node.js and Express, ensures fast and secure operations, while MongoDB provides scalable and reliable data storage. Key features include real-time seat availability, booking management, and a mobile-first design that adapts seamlessly to all devices.
features: MERN stack architecture (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
Scalable backend and secure data handling

title: Medical Biller
description: A comprehensive Laravel-based SaaS platform for medical billing, featuring multi-role access (Doctor, Company, Job Seeker), advanced dashboards, dynamic job and company listings, integrated blogs, and robust admin controls. Built with modern technologies (Laravel, Alpine.js, Tailwind CSS, MySQL), this project streamlines medical billing operations and empowers users with intuitive interfaces and powerful management tools.
details: Medical Biller is a comprehensive SaaS solution for medical billing management. The platform features multi-role access for doctors, companies, and job seekers, each with tailored dashboards and functionalities. Built with Laravel, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS, it offers a modern, responsive interface with powerful features for managing medical billing operations, job postings, and company profiles. The system includes robust admin controls, analytics, and reporting capabilities to streamline medical billing workflows and improve operational efficiency.

title: Balady
description: Balady is an advanced training platform where users can register, enroll in courses, access lessons, pass exams, and get certified. It provides a seamless e-learning experience with progress tracking and certification.
details: Balady is a comprehensive e-learning platform that offers a complete learning management solution. The platform features user registration, course enrollment, lesson management, exam functionality, and certification. Built with Angular for the frontend and Laravel for the backend, it provides a responsive and interactive learning experience. The system includes progress tracking, course management, and certification features to support both learners and instructors in a seamless online learning environment.

title: Balady Dashboard
description: Balady Dashboard is the admin panel for the Balady training platform. Admins can manage exams, answer questions, handle users, courses, lessons, and view analytics for platform performance and user progress.
details: Balady Dashboard serves as the administrative control center for the Balady e-learning platform. This powerful dashboard enables administrators to manage all aspects of the learning platform, including user management, course administration, exam creation and grading, content management, and analytics. Built with Laravel and Bootstrap, it provides a responsive and intuitive interface for managing the entire e-learning ecosystem. The dashboard includes comprehensive reporting features to track user progress, course completion rates, and overall platform performance.

title: MERN Balady
description: Balady is an advanced training platform converted from Laravel to Node.js backend. Users can register, enroll in courses, access lessons, pass exams, and get certified. It provides a seamless e-learning experience with progress tracking and certification.
details: MERN Balady is a comprehensive e-learning platform that has been successfully migrated from Laravel to Node.js backend for improved performance and scalability. The platform features user registration, course enrollment, lesson management, exam functionality, and certification. Built with Angular for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend, it provides a responsive and interactive learning experience. The system includes progress tracking, course management, and certification features to support both learners and instructors in a seamless online learning environment.
features: Migrated from Laravel to Node.js backend

title: IntraCheck - HABOOB Flight Management System
description: A comprehensive UAV/drone flight management system with bilingual pre-flight and post-flight checklists, flight logbooks, PDF generation, and admin dashboard for aviation operations.
details:
IntraCheck is a professional-grade flight management system designed specifically for UAV (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) operations under the HABOOB project. The system provides comprehensive flight operation management with the following capabilities:

- Bilingual pre-flight checklists (English/Arabic) with detailed inspection items
- Post-flight checklists for maintenance and operational verification
- Digital flight logbooks with takeoff/landing data tracking
- PDF generation using Puppeteer for official documentation
- Multi-role user authentication (Admin, Pilot, Maintenance)
- Admin dashboard with user management and analytics
- Real-time flight data collection and storage
- Maintenance record tracking and compliance
- Session-based authentication with MongoDB storage
- Responsive EJS templates with modern UI

Built with Node.js and Express for the backend, MongoDB for data persistence, and EJS for server-side rendering. The system ensures aviation compliance through structured checklists and automated PDF report generation for regulatory requirements.
